import React from "react"; import {useDispatch , useSelector} from "react-redux"; import * as OrderActions from '../../../../redux/orders/orders.action'; import * as OrderReducer from '../../../../redux/orders/orders.reducer'; import Spinner from "../../../layout/components/spinner/Spinner"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; interface IProps{ } interface IState{ orders : OrderReducer.orderState } let OrderSuccess : React.FC = () => { let dispatch = useDispatch(); let orderState : OrderReducer.orderState = useSelector((state : IState) => { return state.orders }) let {loading , order} = orderState let takePrint = () => { return window.print(); } return(

Order Success

{ loading ? :
{ Object.keys(order).length > 0 ?

Order Summary

  • Order ID : {order._id}
  • NAME : {order.name}
  • Email : {order.email}
  • Mobile : {order.mobile}
  • DATE : {new Date(order.createdAt as string).toLocaleDateString()}
{order.items.map((item,index) => { return( ) })}
S.no Item Name Brand Quantity Total
{index+1} {item.name} {item.brand} {item.qty} {(item.price*item.qty).toFixed(2)}
Tax : ₹ {Number(order.tax)?.toFixed(2)}
Grand Total : ₹ {(order.tax + order.total).toFixed(2)}

NOTE : Your shipment will be delivered within 3 business days

Done
:

Please select some items

 }
} ) } export default OrderSuccess;
